description:
It’s your last chance to get the colossal Dead by Daylight x Attack on Titan Collection. Get your Outfits before they leave the store on July 18th!

Dead by Daylight x Attack on Titan: War Hammer Pack

The Spirit – War Hammer Titan – ULTRA RARE
Felix Richter – Armin’s Uniform – VERY RARE
Kate Denson – Historia’s Uniform – VERY RARE 
Zarina Kassir – Hange’s Uniform – VERY RARE 
Ace Visconti – Kenny’s Uniform – VERY RARE

The War Hammer Pack only includes the Outfits, and Dead by Daylight characters must be purchased separately. Pack Outfit selection cannot be customized. 

Looking for more Dead by Daylight x Attack on Titan content? Check out the Attack on Titan: Armored pack, featuring the other 5 Outfits from the Collection. Now’s your chance to collect them all!
name: Dead by Daylight x Attack on Titan: War Hammer Pack
